items.content_html: A lightweight SaaS-style inventory management system built on the MERN stack. It provides user authentication, CRUD operations for items and categories, and a responsive dashboard - all powered by a Vite/React frontend, Express/Node.js backend, and MongoDB data store.
items.title: jessherna/MERN-Inventory-System: A lightweight SaaS-style inventory management system built on the MERN stack. It provides user authentication, CRUD operations for items and categories, and a responsive dashboard - all powered by a Vite/React frontend, Express/Node.js backend, and MongoDB data store.

items.content_html: TrackCalories is a lightweight and user-friendly calorie tracking app that helps users monitor their daily food intake, stay on top of their health goals, and build better eating habits. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain your current health, TrackCalories makes food tracking simple and effective.
items.title: yossef150/TrackCalories: TrackCalories is a lightweight and user-friendly calorie tracking app that helps users monitor their daily food intake, stay on top of their health goals, and build better eating habits. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain your current health, TrackCalories makes food tracking simple and effective.

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
